markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Regrowth](/Feats.aspx?ID=4511) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 69 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your command over your vital essence allows you or an ally to recover from grievous wounds. You can cast [regenerate](/Spells.aspx?ID=248) as a 7th-rank primal [innate spell](/Rules.aspx?ID=279) once per day.
name: Regrowth
